DOC.HEADLINE: O.C. RELIGION NOTES / DAYE CLARK
DOC.TEXT: The Rev . Diana Heath will give her first sermon as minister of the Orange Coast Unitarian Universalist Church in Costa Mesa on Sunday at 10:30 a.m. Her sermon is titled " To Say Hello. " She will offer a free adult religious education course , " Writing Your Spiritual Autobiography , " beginning Oct . 3 at 7:30 p.m. She was formerly the minister at St . John ' s Unitarian_Church in Cincinnati . The church is at 1259 Victoria St . Information : ( 714 ) 646-4652 .
